messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] local e-group
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, I meant to send the HECMC info to another list! Mary Ellen Success is a process of living. It s stopping for the moments of beauty, of pleasure, the
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, I meant to send the HECMC info to another list!

Mary Ellen
Success is a process of living.
It's stopping for the moments of beauty, of pleasure, the moments of
peace.
Success is not a destination that you ever reach.
Success is the quality of the journey.

messages.subject: local e-group
messages.msgSnippet: For Nanci and for anyone else interested, there is an e-mail network for the Home Educators Cooperative of the Mid-Columbia (in the Tri-Cities).
messages.messageBody:
For Nanci and for anyone else interested, there is an e-mail network for
the Home Educators Cooperative of the Mid-Columbia (in the Tri-Cities).
HECMC@yahoogroups.com

Mary Ellen
Success is a process of living.
It's stopping for the moments of beauty, of pleasure, the moments of
peace.
Success is not a destination that you ever reach.
Success is the quality of the journey.
